annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Window-to-zone tracking: snap/unsnap notifications, pre-snap geometry for restore, floating state, zone geometry, auto-snap to last zone, restore to persisted zone, resolution-change handling, and keyboard-navigation feedback.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Record that a window was snapped to a zone.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Screen where window was snapped (empty to auto-detect).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Record that a window was snapped to multiple zones.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: List of zone UUIDs (first is primary).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Screen where window was snapped (empty to auto-detect).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Record that a window was unsnapped.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Return the zone UUID a window is snapped to, or empty string.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Return all zone UUIDs a window spans (multi-zone snap).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Return window IDs currently snapped to the given zone.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Window IDs snapped to the zone.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Return all window IDs that are snapped to any zone.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Return the last zone a window was snapped to (for auto-snap).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Last used zone UUID or empty string.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Store window geometry before snapping (for unsnap restore). Only stores on first snap.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Return true if pre-snap geometry is stored for the window.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Return pre-snap geometry validated against current screen bounds (adjusts off-screen). Returns found, x, y, width, height.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: True if geometry was found and validated.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Clear stored pre-snap geometry for the window.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Set whether a window is floating (not snapped).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Return true if the window is floating.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Return all window IDs that are floating.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Unsnap for float toggle; saves zone for later restore.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Return the zone to restore to when unfloating (if any).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: True if a pre-float zone was stored.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Clear saved pre-float zone for the window.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Calculate unfloat restore geometry and zone IDs in one call. Returns JSON with found, zoneIds, x, y, width, height. Supports multi-zone: combined geometry of all pre-float zones.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: JSON: {found, zoneIds, x, y, width, height}.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Return zone geometry as JSON for the given zone (primary screen).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Return zone geometry as JSON for the given zone on the given screen.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Snap a window to its app-rule-defined zone (highest priority auto-snap). Returns geometry and shouldSnap.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: True if window is on all desktops.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: True if an app rule matched and window should be snapped.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Compute snap geometry for auto-snap to last used zone. Respects moveNewWindowsToLastZone setting. Returns geometry and shouldSnap.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: True if window is on all desktops.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: True if caller should apply the geometry.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Snap window to first empty zone (auto-assign). Only fires if layout has autoAssign enabled.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: True if window is on all desktops.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: True if auto-assign matched and window should be snapped.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Restore window to its zone from the previous session. Returns geometry and shouldRestore.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: True if window is on all desktops.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: True if caller should apply the geometry.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Return updated window geometries after resolution change (respects keepWindowsInZonesOnResolutionChange).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: JSON array of {windowId, x, y, width, height}.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Report keyboard-navigation result from KWin effect; daemon emits navigationFeedback for OSD.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Source zone ID for OSD highlighting (optional).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Target zone ID for OSD highlighting (optional).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Screen name where navigation occurred (for OSD placement).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Emitted when a window's zone assignment changes.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Emitted when keyboard shortcut requests float toggle (KWin effect reacts).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: True to float, false to unfloat.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Emitted when KWin effect reports navigation result via reportNavigationFeedback (for OSD).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Source zone ID for OSD highlighting.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Target zone ID for OSD highlighting.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Screen name where navigation occurred (for OSD placement).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Emitted when resnapToNewLayout is called. JSON array of window moves for KWin to apply.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: JSON array [{windowId, targetZoneId, x, y, width, height}, ...]

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Emitted when the daemon's layout becomes available and there are pending zone restores. The KWin effect should retry restoring untracked windows when receiving this signal.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Emitted when a window's floating state changes (e.g., when a floating window is drag-snapped). The KWin effect should listen to this to keep its local floating cache in sync.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Window stable identifier (windowClass:resourceName without pointer address).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Record whether the last snap was user-initiated (for snap-to-last-zone filtering).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: True if user performed the snap (drag or shortcut), false if auto-snapped.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Report that the cursor has moved to a different screen. Called by KWin effect when cursor crosses monitor boundaries.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Name of the screen the cursor is now on (e.g. DP-1).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Notify daemon that a window was closed (cleanup).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Notify daemon that a window was activated/focused.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Resnap all windows from the previous layout to the current layout. Maps by zone number (1->1, 2->2) with cycling when new layout has fewer zones. Call after switching layouts.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Set whether a window is sticky (visible on all virtual desktops).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: True if window is on all desktops.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Trigger snap-all-windows from daemon shortcut. Emits snapAllWindowsRequested signal for the KWin effect to collect unsnapped windows and assign them to zones.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Calculate zone assignments for a list of unsnapped windows. Called by KWin effect after collecting unsnapped windows on the target screen.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: JSON array [{windowId, targetZoneId, x, y, width, height}, ...]

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Emitted when snap-all-windows shortcut is triggered. KWin effect should collect unsnapped windows and call calculateSnapAllWindows.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Emitted when rotate windows shortcut is triggered. JSON array of window moves for KWin to apply.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: True for clockwise rotation, false for counterclockwise.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: JSON array [{windowId, sourceZoneId, targetZoneId, x, y, width, height}, ...]

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Emitted when a window should be moved to a specific zone.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Emitted when focus should move to a window in a specific zone.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Window to focus (empty to pick topmost).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Emitted when the active window should be restored to its pre-snap geometry.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Emitted when two windows should be swapped between zones.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: JSON geometry for the target zone.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Emitted when windows in a zone should be cycled (forward/backward).
